author: ralexstokes
content:
if anyone wants to experiment with the `mev-rs` stack, i just pushed a "mock" relay approximately like the one in `mergemock`

i don't think it is exactly conformant with `mergemock` but it does work w/ `mev-boost-rs` so it is at least self-consistent and you will be able to verify your signing routines are working correctly

to run (assuming  you have a rust toolchain w/ cargo already):
```
$ git clone https://github.com/ralexstokes/mev-rs
$ cd mev-rs
$ cargo run relay mock example.config.toml # to run the mock `mev-relay-rs`
$ cargo run boost example.config.toml      # to run `mev-boost-rs`
```
